inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source of Html contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can use new Uri format to point source contents like `var://MY_VAR_NAME`, `file://./local.hml` or `http://host:8080/my-get-route`

inputs.name: queries
inputs.label: Html Selector or Jsonpath-plus to get Generated Inputs fields
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Set of queries to extract values from html contents: 
```
$var div_text = [.selected] 
var input_name = .name 
$echo div>span[.quote]```
